meanings.definition: Excess of uric acid in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Hyperuricemias can lead to gout if not managed properly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with hyperuricemias after reviewing the blood test results.
meanings.sent3: The party buffet had so many rich foods that it felt like a gathering of hyperuricemias waiting to happen.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of blood, hyperuricemias floated like tiny acid-filled islands.
meanings.sent5: The image of hyperuricemias in the blood was as vivid as a red warning flag.

meanings.definition: The condition of having elevated levels of uric acid in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Hyperuricemias can cause discomfort and joint pain.
meanings.sent2: She was concerned about her hyperuricemias and decided to change her diet.
meanings.sent3: The hyperuricemias in his blood seemed to have a party of their own, causing mischief.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperuricemias were like little troublemakers, stirring up chaos in her body.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's explanation of hyperuricemias made the concept crystal clear to the patient.
